aboutRight.aboutText: I have a deep passion for crafting extraordinary digital experiences — no matter the size or scale of your project. Whether you're looking for a simple website, or a more complex web application with robust features, I offer a range of services to take your web presence to new heights.

archivement.text: With 9+ years of experience delivering value to clients, I can support you at any stage in your project cycle, from planning to layout and implementation.
My tech stack includes HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React on the front end, along with Node.js, Express, MongoDB and PostgreSQL on the server side.

aboutRight.note: “Computers aren’t the thing. They are the thing that gets us to the thing.” — Joe MacMillan, Halt and Catch Fire, S1

experienceData.text: As a developer, I draw upon my unique background in benefits communication to build human-centric websites and web apps. In previous roles I've helped clients transform technical benefits topics into digital content that empowers people to take control of their health and retirement futures.

serviceData.title: Static Websites
serviceData.heading: Get a simple, straightforward website off the ground quickly.
serviceData.text:
My static website development services are perfect for creating simple, reliable sites that can be developed and deployed swiftly. This is ideal for blogs, portfolios, landing pages and multi-page business websites.

If you need a domain, I'll help you secure your hosting solution based on the scale of your project. I'll also provide options for SSL certification so that your brand-new website meets the latest web security standards.

As an added service, you may opt for a monthly retainer if your website needs regular updates after launch.

serviceData.title: E-commerce
serviceData.heading: Unleash your online retail potential with my Shopify and full-stack services.
serviceData.text:
Online retail sales are estimated to exceed $6.3 trillion USD worldwide in 2024 — and they're expected to reach new heights in the coming years.

Whether you need a user-facing storefront, or a custom full-stack solution, I'll ensure a seamless online shopping experience for your customers. I mainly use the Shopify platform for its easy setup and scalability, but we can discuss options if you have other preferences.

As with static websites, I also offer maintenance services for ongoing updates and peace of mind.

serviceData.title: WordPress
serviceData.heading: Set up your website on the world's most popular content management platform.
serviceData.text: WordPress powers nearly a third of the Internet, from small blogs to the websites of major corporations like Sony, Time and NBC. I can build you a template-based WordPress site or a custom one from the ground up. If you have an existing site that you want to migrate to a new WordPress theme, I'll ensure the process goes as smoothly as possible with nothing lost in between.

serviceData.title: Web Maintenance
serviceData.heading: Need someone to keep your website up to date? Let me take care of it.
serviceData.text: I offer website maintenance services to help keep your website up to date, hassle-free. Let's discuss setting up a monthly retainer fee depending on the size of your website or project. I'll be on hand to make any updates like content changes, image revisions or even adding new pages. Just shoot me an email, and I've got you covered.

paragraphList.text: A full-stack web application built on React and Next.js. It features stunning bar and restaurant visuals, along with back-end functionality to capture dinner reservation data, blog comments and contact form submissions.

NASA is recognized around the world, but not everyone knows the full picture of what they do. This static web app fetches data from NASA's APIs to offer a glimpse into the agency. It is built on HTML, CSS and client-side JavaScript.
A multi-page website for Rose Bakery with a heavy emphasis on dynamic visuals, including a rotating homepage banner, slideshows and crisp images.
A static landing page for Ayesha Hair Salon built from scratch with only HTML and CSS. It has a dynamic image layout, including a masonry gallery that takes advantage of CSS grid.

contactForm.text: Have an idea for an exciting new project, or just want to chat? I'd love to hear from you.
